channel.title: Noob Help with 508 HD client
channel.description: OK so I'm doing this Tut http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=327545.0 by tonypker13 SO I've Made this folder C:\WINDOWS\.titana_cache_32\cache508\cache508 with the Cache508 files I've dl'd the '508 HD Client' Included and the 'Server 508' also included, but No directions are included to place the stuff anywhere. So where DO I UN .rar the files ( Server and Client) to get this to work properly without ANY errors :confused: Please remember I'm using Xp 64bit sp2 and I'm a noob

item.title: Noob Help with 508 HD client
item.dc:creator: @MaruaderFox MaruaderFox
item.description:
@MaruaderFox wrote:

OK so I’m doing this Tut http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=327545.0 by tonypker13
SO I’ve Made this folder C:\WINDOWS.titana_cache_32\cache508\cache508 with the Cache508 files
I’ve dl’d the ‘508 HD Client’ Included and the ‘Server 508’ also included, but No directions are included to place the stuff anywhere.
So where DO I UN .rar the files ( Server and Client) to get this to work properly without ANY errors
Please remember I’m using Xp 64bit sp2 and I’m a noob

Read full topic
